sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: As of SUSE Manager 3.1 you can visualize both virtualized and proxy systems.
To visualize your systems select Audit Visualization from the left navigation menu.
This feature allows you to search, filter and partition systems by name, base channel, check-in date, etc.

listitem.para: The Virtualization Hierarchy is a graphic representation of the virtual network hierarchy tree of the systems registered with SUSE Manager.
The Proxy Hierarchy is a graphic representation of the proxy network hierarchy tree of the systems registered with SUSE Manager.
